attributes.action: Increase demand for the manufacturing of products from recycled materials in our country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Old newspapers and cereal boxes are rotting in warehouses, rejected by the usually buoyant foreign market. This goes for aluminium cans and other recyclable materials. 

It annoys me to see that 80% of the packaging from my supermarket foods cannot be recycled and is not made from recycled materials.

The government needs to put pressure on all UK companies to produce recyclable packaging and use recycled materials from our ever growing stockpiles for their packaging.
